Question: This person approached the regiment alone, dismounted his horse and, when he was within gunshot range, shouted, "Here I am.
Hints: This person said: "My true glory is not to have won 40 battles...Waterloo will erase the memory of so many victories. ..
In terms of impact on events, it was more than this person's personality that took effect.
He became this person II in 1814 and reigned for only two weeks.
